title: Animated Hero Section Word-by-Word Reveal
description: Verify the hero section cycles through multiple promotional messages with smooth word-by-word reveal animations and shiny gradient text effects.

steps.description: Navigate to the ERTickAPP Portal Landing Page
Observe the hero text animates word-by-word with no jank or glitches
Verify the promotional messages cycle continuously and smoothly
Check the shiny gradient text effect is visible and consistent

title: Dashboard Preview Carousel Interactions
description: Ensure the dashboard preview system updates preview images on hover and click with fade-in lazy loading transitions for all nine dashboard modules.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page and locate the dashboard preview carousel
Hover over each of the nine dashboard options one by one
Confirm the preview image updates to the correct dashboard view with a fade-in transition
Click each dashboard option
Verify the preview image updates accordingly with visual feedback
Check images lazy load and do not cause performance delays

title: Login Form Transition and Inline Validation
description: Validate the smooth fade/zoom transition when clicking 'Enter Dashboard' and the comprehensive inline login form validation including visual feedback and error messages.

steps.description: Click the 'Enter Dashboard' button on the landing page
Confirm the button transitions to the inline login form with smooth fade and zoom animation
Input invalid user ID/email and observe validation feedback
Verify real-time error messages appear for incorrect format
Input password that violates complexity rules
Verify password complexity violations are indicated with clear error messages
Clear inputs and check error messages disappear

title: Login Keyboard Shortcuts Handling
description: Test keyboard shortcuts in the login form including Ctrl+C to clear input fields and other relevant shortcuts for accessibility.

steps.description: Focus on a login input field
Enter text into the input field
Press Ctrl+C key combination
Verify the input field is cleared immediately
Test other keyboard navigation keys (Tab, Shift+Tab) to move between inputs
Confirm keyboard focus moves correctly and fields are accessible

title: Login Form Submission and Error Handling
description: Verify the login form correctly handles submissions with loading state, success and error messages upon invalid or valid credentials.

steps.description: Fill login form with invalid credentials
Submit the form
Check for loading state display
Verify appropriate error message is shown after failed login
Fill login form with valid credentials
Submit the form
Confirm loading state and successful login transition occur

title: Responsive Header Navigation Behavior
description: Test header navigation responsiveness: mobile header hides/shows on scroll, desktop header remains persistent, and navigation buttons scroll smoothly to page sections.

steps.description: Access landing page on desktop viewport
Verify header remains sticky and visible during scrolling
Click header navigation buttons
Confirm smooth scroll to corresponding sections
Access landing page on mobile viewport
Scroll down and observe header hides
Verify header hides on downward scroll and reappears on upward scroll

title: Scroll-triggered Animations Execution and Performance
description: Validate that scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer activate correctly for highlights, features, benefits, about, and footer sections as they come into view without jank or excessive CPU usage.

steps.description: Scroll vertically through the entire landing page
Verify each major section animates upon entering viewport
Confirm animations do not repeat unnecessarily once triggered
Observe smooth animation transitions and check for no performance degradation

title: Mobile Highlights Carousel Auto Rotation and Interaction
description: Test the mobile-optimized highlights carousel for auto-rotation timing, smooth transition effects, and manual swipe/tap interactions.

steps.description: Load landing page on a mobile device or mobile viewport
Confirm highlights carousel auto-rotates through benefit items at specified intervals
Manually swipe or tap on carousel controls
Verify smooth transitions and immediate response to user control

title: Benefits Section Layout and Animation
description: Verify the asymmetric layout with alternating color schemes for benefits section, including staggered entrance animations and visual correctness across screen sizes.

steps.description: Navigate to the benefits section on desktop and mobile
Verify color schemes alternate between navy, yellow, and orange as per design
Confirm grid asymmetry and content alignment meet design specifications
Check staggered animation triggers correctly when section enters viewport

title: About Section Content and Animated Elements
description: Check the about section includes company information, SAP integration badges, animated decorative icons, correct two-column layout on desktop, and accessibility features.

steps.description: Navigate to the about section on desktop viewport
Verify two-column layout is correctly displayed
Confirm SAP integration badges are visible and correctly labeled
Observe animated decorative icons for smooth motion and no glitches
Check semantic HTML and ARIA attributes for accessibility compliance

title: Footer Information Display and Styling
description: Ensure footer displays company logo, tagline, contact information, and business hours with correct content, styling, and rounded-top design responsive on all screen sizes.

steps.description: Scroll to footer on desktop and mobile devices
Verify company logo and tagline are present and correctly styled
Check that website, phone, head office address, and hours of operation are accurate and visible
Confirm footer has rounded-top design as per UI specifications

title: Smooth Scrolling and Lenis Library Integration
description: Validate the Lenis smooth scroll library provides buttery smooth scrolling experience with appropriate gesture support and programmatic scrolling on all devices and browsers.

steps.description: Navigate landing page and perform manual scroll with mouse, trackpad, and touch devices
Confirm smooth scroll animation with no jitters or abrupt jumps
Use header navigation buttons to programmatically scroll to sections
Verify smooth scroll triggers correctly and target sections are accurately reached

title: Client-side Login Form Validation Rules
description: Test client-side validation for login form enforcing user ID/email format, password complexity (uppercase, lowercase, digit, special character), length constraints, and real-time error feedback.

steps.description: Enter various invalid user IDs/emails including empty, malformed, and boundary cases in login input
Verify appropriate error states and messages appear in real-time
Enter passwords missing one or more complexity requirements (e.g., no uppercase, no digit, too short)
Confirm validation errors display for each missing criteria
Enter a password fulfilling all complexity and length requirements
Check validation passes and error messages clear

title: Image Lazy Loading and Fade-in Transition
description: Verify all dashboard preview images and other critical images lazy load correctly with fade-in transitions to improve perceived performance and reduce initial load.

steps.description: Load the landing page with network throttling enabled to simulate slow connection
Observe images load lazily only when about to enter viewport
Confirm images fade in smoothly upon loading with no pop-in or flicker

title: Accessibility Compliance across UI Components and Forms
description: Audit the landing page for semantic HTML usage, keyboard navigation support, and ARIA attributes on input fields, error messages, and navigation elements to meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Navigate the page using keyboard only: Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, and arrow keys
Verify logical focus order and visible focus indicators
Use screen reader tools to inspect ARIA labels and roles on form inputs, error messages, and navigation
Confirm all interactive elements have appropriate labels and live regions where applicable

title: Performance Optimization under User Interaction
description: Ensure throttled scroll events, unobserving after animation triggers, and lazy loading reduce CPU usage and prevent memory leaks during extended user sessions.

steps.description: Continuously scroll through the landing page multiple times over extended period
Monitor the CPU usage to verify no spikes or degradation due to scroll event handling
Check that once scroll-triggered animations have fired, observers are disconnected as designed
